column4: hi, when i play video files (mpeg,wmv) i only have the voice, and the screen is blue. is there any solution to that?
get the codecs for it
what media player you using?
totem/mplayer what is the codec? i've already installed gstreamer-ffmpeg and w32codecs
install all the gstreamer except ones that end in -doc or -dbg, and as for mplayer I don't know how to get it fully functional
: i have already done that,
did you miss any?
grab em all not just one it wants
usually when my media player fails I fall back to vlc
no, i have installed even the docs lol
its 10.0 gstreamer you installed right? those older ones might mess it up
there is no difference between vlc,totem or mplayer the screen is blue in all of them :(
blue!? it should be blank
some sort of custom theme you got going?
i installed 10.0 , no it's blue!
no, my window manager is wmii2 a very basic one
I think the default is a black blankness, perhaps the video is playing but its blue.. is there supposed to be a picture?
I have never tried that before do you have link to their website?
nvm I found it, looks nice. I usually use icewm for light weight ones
wmii2? it's great it's the vim of window managers it's in the repository
vim!? eep! *hides underneath desk*
I prefer green or teal
does it work okay if you login to another window manager session?
i like vim, after a while it becomes one of the most valuable things you have :D
